mapper.select: SELECT gy_sh_gasemission.*,company.*,co.COUNTY_NAME,co.city_code,co.city_name,SUBSTR(gy_sh_gasemission.scccode,1,2) AS scc1, SUBSTR(gy_sh_gasemission.scccode,3,2) AS scc2,SUBSTR(gy_sh_gasemission.scccode,5,3) AS scc3,SUBSTR(gy_sh_gasemission.scccode,8,3) AS scc4 FROM gy_sh_gasemission LEFT JOIN company ON gy_sh_gasemission.factory_id=company.com_id LEFT JOIN ( SELECT county.COUNTY_ID,county.COUNTY_NAME,city.city_name,city.city_code FROM county LEFT JOIN city ON county.city_code=city.city_code ) co ON co.COUNTY_ID=company.county_id where gy_sh_gasemission.id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.insert:
insert into gy_sh_gasemission
id,
year,
factory_id,
gy_name,
activity_note,
density,
activity,
activity_unit,
efficency,
pm10_emission,
pm25_emission,
so2_emission,
nox_emission,
voc_emission,
nh3_emission,
co_emission,
oc_emission,
bc_emission,
emission_unit,
scccode,
source_discrip,
flag,

insert into gy_sh_gasemission (id, year, factory_id, gy_name, activity_note, density, activity, activity_unit, efficency, pm10_emission, pm25_emission, so2_emission, nox_emission, voc_emission, nh3_emission, co_emission, oc_emission, bc_emission, emission_unit, scccode, source_discrip, flag) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{year,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{factoryId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{gyName,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{activityNote,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{density,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{activity,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{activityUnit,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{efficency,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{pm10Emission,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{pm25Emission,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{so2Emission,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{noxEmission,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{vocEmission,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{nh3Emission,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{coEmission,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{ocEmission,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{bcEmission,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{emissionUnit,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{scccode,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{sourceDiscrip,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{flag,jdbcType=INTEGER}) ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, year = #{year,jdbcType=CHAR}, factory_id = #{factoryId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, gy_name = #{gyName,jdbcType=CHAR}, activity_note = #{activityNote,jdbcType=CHAR}, density = #{density,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, activity = #{activity,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, activity_unit = #{activityUnit,jdbcType=CHAR}, efficency = #{efficency,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, pm10_emission = #{pm10Emission,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, pm25_emission = #{pm25Emission,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, so2_emission = #{so2Emission,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, nox_emission = #{noxEmission,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, voc_emission = #{vocEmission,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, nh3_emission = #{nh3Emission,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, co_emission = #{coEmission,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, oc_emission = #{ocEmission,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, bc_emission = #{bcEmission,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, emission_unit = #{emissionUnit,jdbcType=CHAR}, scccode = #{scccode,jdbcType=CHAR}, source_discrip = #{sourceDiscrip,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, flag = #{flag,jdbcType=INTEGER}

INSERT INTO gy_sh_gasemission (year, factory_id, gy_name, activity_note, density, activity, activity_unit, efficency, pm10_emission, pm25_emission, so2_emission, nox_emission, voc_emission, nh3_emission, co_emission, oc_emission, bc_emission, emission_unit, scccode, source_discrip, flag) VALUES
( #{item.year,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{item.factoryId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{item.gyName,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{item.activityNote,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{item.density,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{item.activity,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{item.activityUnit,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{item.efficency,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{item.pm10Emission,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{item.pm25Emission,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{item.so2Emission,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{item.noxEmission,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{item.vocEmission,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{item.nh3Emission,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{item.coEmission,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{item.ocEmission,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{item.bcEmission,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{item.emissionUnit,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{item.scccode,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{item.sourceDiscrip,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.flag,jdbcType=INTEGER} )
mapper.update:

year = #{year,jdbcType=CHAR},

gy_name = #{gyName,jdbcType=CHAR},
activity_note = #{activityNote,jdbcType=CHAR},
density = #{density,jdbcType=DOUBLE},

pm25_emission = #{pm25Emission,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
so2_emission = #{so2Emission,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
nox_emission = #{noxEmission,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
voc_emission = #{vocEmission,jdbcType=DOUBLE},

co_emission = #{coEmission,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
oc_emission = #{ocEmission,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
bc_emission = #{bcEmission,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
emission_unit = #{emissionUnit,jdbcType=CHAR},
scccode = #{scccode,jdbcType=CHAR},

where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
